entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
